policyText.part1: By logging in, you agree to our

availableDays.title: How many days are you available per week?

duration.title: How long do you want your running plan to be?
duration.choose_weeks: I want to choose the amount of weeks
duration.choose_date: I want to choose a specific date

experience.title: How experienced of a runner are you?
experience.level_1_description: I've never run before, but I'm ready to start!
experience.level_2_description: I've run a little, but I'm still pretty new to this.
experience.level_3_description: I run occasionally, but nothing too serious.
experience.level_4_description: I run regularly and have a good pace going.
experience.level_5_description: I'm experienced and always up for a new challenge!

start.title: Let's create your custom running plan

strava.title: Do you want to link your Strava account?

settings.title: Settings
settings.logoutConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?
settings.newPlanConfirmMessage: Creating a new plan will erase your current progress. Are you sure you want to continue?
settings.disclaimer: RunnerAI is an AI tool designed to assist with your running development. It does not replace professional coaching.
settings.deleteAccountConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
settings.deleteAccountEmailBody:
Hello,

I would like to request the deletion of my RunnerAI account associated with the email: {{email}}. Please process this request as soon as possible.

Thank you.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.completeMoreWorkouts: Complete {{count}} more day(s) to enable analytics.
analytics.upgradeToAccess: Upgrade to premium to access this feature.

chat.title: AI coach
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
chat.welcomeMessage: Ask me anything about your running plan!
chat.dailyLimitExceeded: Something wrong happened... Please try again later.

completed.title: Congratulations!
completed.subtitle: You've completed your running plan. Ready for a new challenge?

share.selectTemplateDescription: Select a template for your Instagram story.
share.selectBackgroundDescription: Select a photo or video from your library or take a photo with your camera.
share.cameraPermissionError: Sorry, we need camera permissions to make this work!

newRunningPlan.title: Choose your new running plan
newRunningPlan.beginnerDescription: Perfect for those new to running or getting back into it.
newRunningPlan.intermediateDescription: For runners with some experience looking to improve.
newRunningPlan.advancedDescription: Challenging plan for experienced runners aiming to push their limits.
newRunningPlan.customDescription: Create a fully personalized plan tailored to your specific needs and goals.

paywall.title: Unlock premium to speed up your progress

benefits.aiCoach: Get real-time advice and support from our AI coach.
benefits.advancedAnalytics: Track your improvements with in-depth analytics and insights that keep you motivated.
benefits.customPlan: Tailored training schedules designed to meet your unique goals and fitness level.
